snippet.title: Monkey City Gameplay Trailer - Open Beta
snippet.description:
Bloons Monkey City is the latest game from Ninja Kiwi and it's now in open beta!
http://ninjakiwi.com/Games/Tower-Defense/Bloons-Monkey-City.html


Bloons Monkey City is the premier city building, bloon popping, upgrade cranking simulation of our time. Expand your glorious city from a small town to a bustling metropolis, construct buildings for monkey recruitment, research powerful upgrades, and fight against the wild bloons, not only around your city but also the bloon hordes in Monkey vs. Monkey duels!

To start your own Monkey City, head on over to ninjakiwi.com and have a play!
http://ninjakiwi.com/Games/Tower-Defense/Bloons-Monkey-City.html
